Icon.Name: ID42722
Icon.PoiDescription:
ID:42722 9.55,30.39,276.75 Pull these levers to disable the shields on the power cells. Follow the combinations on the tooltips that appear when you mouse over the cells at close range. 0-looking symbol means the lever should be facing away from the cells. L/1 symbol means the lever should be facing towards the cells.
Destroying the cells spawns adds from the passage you came from. Destroy all four cells to spawn a named and progress the zone.
